meanings.definition: A person who shares a partnership or joint venture with another.
meanings.sent1: My pardners and I started a small business together.
meanings.sent2: I trust my pardners with our shared project.
meanings.sent3: When my pardners and I team up, we make a great team.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, finding reliable pardners is crucial.
meanings.sent5: The bond between pardners is built on trust and cooperation.

meanings.sent1: My pardners always have my back when I need them.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy spending time with my pardners on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: Laughing with my pardners always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: True pardnership is about supporting each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The loyalty between true pardners is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A term used in cowboy slang to refer to a partner or companion.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy rode into town with his trusty pardners by his side.
meanings.sent2: The rancher and his pardners worked together to herd the cattle.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy's pardners shared stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: In the wild west, a cowboy's pardners were like family.
meanings.sent5: The bond between cowboy pardners was as strong as the leather on their saddles.
